feed.title: Google Cloud: Cloud Run functions
feed.subtitle: Changelog for Google Cloud product: Cloud Run functions

entry.summary: The Go 1.24 runtime is now available in preview for Google Cloud Functions, offering enhanced features and performance.
entry.title: Feature: Go 1.24 Runtime Now in Preview

entry.content: Support for the [Ruby 3.4 runtime](https://cloud.google.com/functions/docs/concepts/execution-environment#ruby) is in [General Availability (GA)](https://cloud.google.com/products/?_gl=1*dplot*_ga*MTM2MDk5MzEzMi4xNzQ1ODg0OTY5*_ga_4LYFWVHBEB*MTc0NjE0MTA3Ny4yMi4xLjE3NDYxNDEwOTYuMC4wLjA.#product-launch-stages).
entry.summary: Ruby 3.4 runtime is now generally available. This update enhances the capabilities and performance of your applications running on our platform.
entry.title: Feature: Ruby 3.4 runtime now available

entry.content: Support for the [PHP 8.4 runtime](https://cloud.google.com/functions/docs/concepts/execution-environment#php) is in [General Availability (GA)](https://cloud.google.com/products/?_gl=1*dplot*_ga*MTM2MDk5MzEzMi4xNzQ1ODg0OTY5*_ga_4LYFWVHBEB*MTc0NjE0MTA3Ny4yMi4xLjE3NDYxNDEwOTYuMC4wLjA.#product-launch-stages).
entry.summary: PHP 8.4 runtime is now generally available. This update provides the latest features and improvements for your PHP applications.
entry.title: Feature: PHP 8.4 runtime now available

entry.content: For Java functions that use `functions-framework` version 1.4.0 or later, you can now use the logging class `java.util.logging.Logger` to add a [unique execution ID](https://cloud.google.com/run/docs/runtimes/java#execution_id) to log outputs.
entry.summary: You can now add a unique execution ID to your Java function logs using `java.util.logging.Logger` if you're using functions-framework version 1.4.0 or later. This helps in tracking individual request executions.
entry.title: Feature: Java logging enhancement
